name: Helmed Horror
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t adamantine
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.Magic Resistance: The helmed horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Spell Immunity: The helmed horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include fireball, heat metal, and lightning bolt.

actions.Multiattack: The helmed horror makes two longsword attacks.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.
